segments.text: I see the sink overflowing, water cascading down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on her dish, ignoring it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get wet from the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balance on that stool is precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls into the water, it'll be awful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful with her hand raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This peaceful scene hides so much potential trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a tidy garden, so inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the mom; she'll be upset later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel in her hand is bunched up nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage to the cabinets is inevitable.
segments.speaker: PAR
